channel.title: Possible FPS Glitch? - Surface Tension
channel.description:
I entered the room with the scientist just before the tripmine puzzle and noticed that he looked really similar to the base head for the FCS. Not sure if it's a coincidence, intentional, or an FCS glitch.
![](upload://4z5G2IZt5wOwviENunvdlKHFy6w.png)
